dashboard.addWidgetTitle: Add a widget to the dashboard
dashboard.shareTitle: Share this dashboard with a colleague
dashboard.shareSuccess: Share link copied to your clipboard
dashboard.shareError: Share link could not be copied to your clipboard: {url}
dashboard.manualTitle: A manual layout allows positioning the widgets freely in the dashboard
dashboard.autoTitle: An automatic layout compacts the view to the top-left corner, when space is available
dashboard.fixedTitle: A fixed layout prevents any changes to the dashboard
dashboard.deleteConfirmMessage: Are your sure you want to delete the dashboard "{dashboard}"?
dashboard.saveAsTitle: Save the dashboard to open it later
dashboard.saveAsModalMessage: Enter a name for this dashboard
dashboard.setDefaultConfirm: Do you want to set "{dashboard}" as the default dashboard?
dashboard.setDefaultSuccess: "{dashboard}" was set as the default dashboard
dashboard.renameWidgetMessage: Enter a new name for this widget

activeUsers.info:
Description: Users that had at least the number of sessions (defined by a threshold: {sessionCountThreshold}) where Full-Text Query occurred during the current period.
Interpretation: The more users who return often to search the platform, the more adoption can be assumed. Adoption indicator.
Calculation: Total number of users who made a number of session with Full-Text Query > {sessionCountThreshold}. Based on session summary

activeUsersRate.info:
Description: Users that had at least the number of sessions (defined by a threshold: {sessionCountThreshold}) where Full-Text Query occurred during the current period in relation to the total number of unique users.
Interpretation: The more users who return often to search the platform, the more adoption can be assessed in relation to the total number of unique users. Adoption indicator.
Calculation: Total active users / Total unique users.

userCoverage.info:
Description: Active Users compared to total number of potential users (defined by the required option: potential_total_user_count).
Interpretation: Evaluation of user adoption. Adoption indicator.
Calculation: Total number of active users / Total number of potential users ( set to {potential_total_user_count})

newUsersTimeline.info:
Description: Users that logged in for the first time displayed over time.
Interpretation: Adoption indicator.
Calculation: Addition of all user-ids where firstlogin > {start}

stat.trendTooltip:
This trend has been calculated between the {currentDate} and the previous {trendRange}.
Current value = {currentValue}.
Previous value = {previousValue}
stat.trendTooltipPrevDates:
This trend has been calculated between the {currentDate} and {trendRange}.
Current value = {currentValue}.
Previous value = {previousValue}

trendsCalculations.title: Trends calculations
trendsCalculations.label: Use the preceding period of same duration
trendsCalculations.tooltip: For example, if  "Last 6 months " is selected above, trends will be automatically computed against the previous 6 months period.
trendsCalculations.customPeriodTooltip: This period is used a baseline to measure the evolution of the metrics displayed in the dashboard.
